title: Wedding Bells For Farhan-Shibani, Sonali Bendre Flaunts Her Post-Surgery Scar And More From Ent
description: Forget Confirming The Relationship, Farhan Akhtar Drops A Major Hint About His & Shibani Dandekar's Wedding! Farhan said, "She's just having fun with all the rumours going around.
